mapper.select: SELECT M_IDX AS MIDX, MY_T.T_IDX AS TIDX, T_NAME as TNAME FROM MY_T, TEAM WHERE MY_T.T_IDX=TEAM.T_IDX and M_IDX=#{mIdx}
SELECT NAME FROM MY_T,MEMBER WHERE MY_T.M_IDX=MEMBER.M_IDX AND T_IDX=#{lastTIdx}
SELECT D_IDX AS DIDX, D_NAME AS DNAME FROM DESIGN WHERE T_IDX=#{tIdx}
SELECT D_PURP FROM D_PURP WHERE D_IDX=#{dIdx}
